conbody.codeblock: duckdata> add entry (mallard) ; 1 entry added (0.05 sec) duckdata> _
conbody.p: To add a duck species to your database, type add entry followed by the name of the duck in parentheses into the command line and press Enter.
conbody.lq: How much fairer than the pool before the farmers door, in which his ducks swim! Hither the clean wild ducks come. Nature has no human inhabitant who appreciates her. The birds with their plumage and their notes are in harmony with the flowers, but what youth or maiden conspires with the wild luxuriant beauty of Nature?

section.title: Sharing your duck database
section.p: Export your duck database as HTML output to make it easy to share on your website. You can also offer your database to users as a download.
section.draft-comment: Are you sure you want to offer a download?

required-cleanup.p: Consider giving users the option to send feedback or suggested entries for your duck database.
